home.title: Welcome
home.text1: Agali Studios is a family-run rental business that started in 2025.
home.text2: It is located by the sea on the Edipsos-Lichada provincial road, just a few minutes by car from the port of Loutra Edipsou or Agiokampos. In Loutra Edipsou, you can shop and enjoy food and drinks.
home.text3: The property has a total of 4 double apartments with balconies. All are fully furnished and equipped for a pleasant stay. From the balcony, you can enjoy sea views, and in our garden, you can relax in the gazebo next to the olive trees.

reservations.title: Reservations
reservations.text1: Thank you for your interest in staying with us!
reservations.text2: You can check availability through the form below. By entering your desired dates and number of guests, our site will redirect you to a secure booking platform.
reservations.text3: If you have any questions or prefer to book by phone, feel free to contact us.

accommodation.title: Accommodation
accommodation.text1: Our 28m² studios with a queen-size bed are ideal for two people/couples. They are fully furnished and equipped with appliances to ensure a comfortable stay and a pleasant vacation in our area.
accommodation.text2: Specifically, they include a refrigerator, stovetop, built-in oven, kettle, and toaster.
accommodation.text3: They are also equipped with plates, glasses, cutlery, and basic cooking utensils for use during your stay.
accommodation.text4: Each apartment also has a private bathroom with a shower, towels, and toiletries.
accommodation.text5: The spacious balcony includes chairs and a table where you can enjoy breakfast with a view of the North Euboean Gulf.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.haveQuestions: Have questions or want to book? We're always here to help!
contact.onYourService: <1>Agali Studios</1> is a family business created with love for hospitality and respect for guests. We look forward to welcoming you to our beautiful place by the sea and offering you a carefree and comfortable stay.
contact.locationDetails: Edipsos - Lichada provincial road, minutes from Loutra Edipsou & Agiokampos
contact.happyToHelp: Whether it’s for a summer vacation or a short getaway, we’re here to make your stay special. Contact us today – we’d be happy to help!
